name: Amexio spinner
description: spinner Component Provides up-to-date feedback on the spinner of a workflow or action with simple yet flexible spinner bars and easy to configure.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Types of spinner:- fadingcircle/ ballspin/ firespin/ threebounce/ spinnerround/ ring/ halfcircle/ rectanglebounce

properties.description: size for spinner(size in  px or % )
